get_started.welcome: Hi {{userFirstName}}! Welcome to Original Coast Clothing where you'll find styles for every occasion.
get_started.guidance: At any time, use the menu below to navigate through the features
get_started.bdo-start: Hi There!   BDO Debt solutions teams are providing free intial consultations and debt help via phone or by video conference as we are proactively monitoring new COVID-19 developments. Are you Looking for debt help?
get_started.help: What we can do to help you today with bdo my friend?

bdo.prompt:
BDO has many resources on our web site. Read More.  

https://debtsolutions.bdo.ca/
bdo.yesmenu: Would you like to call us now? Or have us contact you?
bdo.phonethanks: Thanks! We will call you soon!
bdo.emailthanks: Thanks! Please enter your phone Number
bdo.talktosomeone: Please provide us with your email, name & phone number so a BDO representative can get in touch with you.

survey.prompt: Hi, want to get quick feedback on your recent experience with {{agentFirstName}}
survey.neutral: Thanks for the feedback, if there something we should improve feel free to comment with #suggestion
survey.negative: Thanks for telling us. Sorry to hear that, if there something we can do to turn this let us know
survey.suggestion: Your suggestion has been recorded for future review by the team. If this is something we need to get back to you right now just comment "help"

fallback.attachment: Thanks for sending this attachment, we can connect you to an agent to review it or we can start over
